rationale: The segment contains 'threaten' (verb) and mentions 'dead seabirds' (factual), not an intensified risk-adjective about the virus.
statement_text: It's migration season, so these outbreaks threaten birds and poultry all the way from Africa to Europe and the UK, said Sacha Dench, founder of Conservation Without Borders and an ambassador for the UN's Convention on Migratory Species, who saw more than 500 dead seabirds at two sites last week at the Tanji bird reserve.
